description.en: The Kitauji high school wind instrument club had at one time participated in national tournaments and was a champion school, but after the club's adviser changed, they have not been able to even participate in the qualifying tournament. Under the strict leadership of Taki, a substitute for Ms. Rikako, they steadily build up their strength. As they fight over who plays solos, some students give priority to studying and quit club activities. Finally, the long wished-for day of the contest arrives.

description.en: The holy heroine who roamed the three realms woke up from her sealed memory and found that her reincarnation was simply miserable. Her home was gone, her father was gone, and her sister who had taken over her place actually poached her spirit and insulted her innocence... What's even more outrageous is that she actually married the old devil who was terrified by the ghost abyss? Sacrificial bride? Plaything for entertainment? Not happening, there is no surrender in my dictionary! The beginning was a crematorium, and the process was always exciting. She turned the tide against the wind and had a gorgeous revenge! Let's see how the beautiful, strong and miserable heroine and the sickly and delicate demon emperor work together to turn the tide.

Their powers have been used in the underworld for covering up accidents, assassinations, and all manner of crimes. But these powers not only destroy others' spirits, but also corrupt the users' own hearts…

description.en:
One day, he suddenly became 'Ha Jin' a love-blind sub-protagonist in a webtoon. As he inevitably becomes involved with the main protagonist, Sun Woo, he becomes more and more immersed in the atmosphere and starts talking nonsense...

“Sun Woo, are you a good kisser?”
"Why do you want to know?"
"Sun Woo, why are you so seductive?! If you continue like this, oh, I'll end up liking you!"

The revolving love story of Sun Woo, who slowly falls in love with Ha Jin, and Ha Jin, who is a master of clueless flirting.

title.en: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.ko: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

altTitles.ko-ro: Heungmang Nampyeongwaui Ihone Silpaehan Geon Gatda

altTitles.en: I Am Afraid I Have Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.fr: Je n'ai pas réussi à divorcer de mon (vilain) mari

altTitles.pt: Falhei em me divorciar do meu esposo

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.
description.zh: 漫画简介: 社牛打工人穿成会被疯批男主处死的小恶女，却意外发现10岁的男主是个缺爱小可怜。每天糯叽叽黏人的正太小乖乖，在小恶女的养成下，还会成为腹黑疯批吗？

description.en:
The fifth official Touhou manga (and the first webcomic) written by ZUN and originally drawn by Ginmokusei. 

Touhou Chireikiden focuses on Satori Komeiji's endeavors as a detective, solving mysteries around Gensokyo.

*Serialization was paused for a few months after volume 2 was finished due to the health concerns of the original artist Ginmokusei. The series resumed serialization with Yuu Akimaki as the new artist.*

- **Links:**
[Manga on NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44569)
[Touhou Web Blog](https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/)

- **New serialisation:**
[Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0BQ5KZHYV)
[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/356764/list/)
[EbookJapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/701436/)
description.vi:
Manga chính thức thứ 5 của Touhou, kịch bản được viết bởi ZUN và được minh họa bởi Ginmonkusei (Sau này được đổi thành Akimaki Yuu vì sức khỏe của Ginmonkusei có vấn đề) 

Bộ truyện tập trung vào Satori Komeji, một yêu quái có khả năng đọc tâm trí người khác, cô bắt đầu trở thành thám tử và đi giải quyết các vụ án ở khắp Ảo Tưởng Hương.
description.es-la:
Cada vez que en Gensokyo se produce un incidente en el que está involucrado un youkai, la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei suele resolver la situación confrontando al culpable. Sin embargo, los casos en los que los culpables ocultan su identidad suelen ser demasiado complejos como para que la exterminadora de youkais se encargue de ello.

Entra en escena Satori Komeiji. Como youkai satori, posee un tercer ojo que le permite leer las mentes, detectando a cualquier criminal sin importar las mentiras que pueda inventarse. Con su extraordinaria aptitud como detective, Satori es capaz de resolver todos los misterios que se le plantea, aunque no siempre quiera salir de su mansión.
description.pt-br:
Touhou Chireikiden é a primeira webcomic oficial da série Touhou Project, escrita por ZUN com ilustrações da novata Ginmokusei, apresentando Satori Komeiji como a mestra detetive das profundezas da Terra.

Pode ser lido em japonês gratuitamente no web blog oficial: https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/

description.en: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.en:
"I'll buy you and I'll pay more than anyone else!"
Lee Seol was a single ray of light when Haru lost his sight. After regaining his vision, Haru finds Seol again, but Seol has completely changed. Now, he is hosting wild parties at a mountain lodge, giving himself to men, and receiving sponsorships. Haru decides to become Seol's new sponsor.

An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leads—shadow garden—as well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!

I see what Angels see and do what Demons do. Those are the words a psychopath named Dennis saw when he found "The Channeler"... A powerful artifact that two massive evil corporations (Ravenfort) and (Blue Hand)will stop at nothing to get it back. at the same time Dennis Trauma haunts his day and night, while his adopted brother is still suffering from the loss of his wife ten years ago to a mysterious disease. #thriller_mystery
#mystery #thriller

description.en: The Achiga Girls' Academy in Nara once defeated regional mahjong powerhouse Bansei High School. It advanced into the national team semifinals but lost to the eventual champion, and the mahjong club was later disbanded. Six years later, elementary school student Shizuno Takakamo befriends transfer student Nodoka Haramura. The two eventually enter Achiga Girls', but Nodoka transfers out of the school in the second year. When Shizuno sees Nodoka on television the following year as the national middle school individual mahjong champion, she decides to revive Achiga's mahjong club.

altTitles.ja: ダブルマリッジ

description.en:
In future Japan, bigamy is legalized! Specifically, each person may legally marry two spouses, a simple legal change that brings up a lot of questions about serious romantic relationships. What would long-term relationships be like if they didn't remove you from the dating pool? Would people be more willing to commit if they knew they could also pick someone else later? Would society really jump to accept this as a new social norm, even if it had become legal?  
  
Ikuta Naosuke, a married man, bumps into a classmate from middle school, Itou Yuko, who's had a crush on him. Yuko has grown up to be a pretty nurse, and Naosuke begins to have an affair with her. With the new bigamy laws, Naosuke wants to marry Yuko, too. But how badly would that hurt his first wife? And how will he deal with it if Yuko also finds another man to marry? Naosuke and the people around him are starting to shift towards the new and approved 'double marriage' lifestyle, but they may not be ready for the complicated problems that can arise…

altTitles.ja: ラブ・バレット

description.en:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
description.uk:
З початку існування людства, ті, хто ніколи не відчули кохання і зустріли неочікуваний кінець, отримували другий шанс, як Купідони, як дар від Богині Кохання.

Сьогоденні Купідони змінили свої луки і стріли на новітню зброю, але їх місія залишається такою ж: знайти підходяче кохання для їх цілей і закохати їх!

description.en:
Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew.  
  
Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.

description.en: She's a D-list actress, who is unwanted by everyone, including her family. He's a negligible CEO, who has to carefully calculate his every move, just to survive. Facing the betrayal of closed ones, they formed a close alliance: knowing acting is her dream, he rolls out the red carpet for her; knowing he wants to prove himself, she offers her unconditional support. Hurt and hatred, company and comfort, who can deny that they are already in love...

altTitles.ja: 人間カード

description.en: Mamoru, a mediocre college student, discovers an item of darkness while searching for the missing father of his childhood friend, Yuuka. This item is a "human card" which can trap people on a single sheet of paper for buying and selling. The horrific human trading suspense now begins!
description.ja: 平凡な大学生マモルは、幼馴染ユウカの、失踪した父親を捜す過程で闇のアイテムに辿り着いた。生身の人間を1枚の紙の中に閉じ込め、売買する「人間カード」！

description.en:
A meddlesome high schooler, Mamori Suzufumi, helps her neighbor who had collapsed from hunger. The neighbor turns out to be none other than the extremely popular high school idol, Sasaki Yuzuki!

Yuzuki had been excessively restricting her diet in order to maintain her image as the perfect idol. But when the worried Suzufumi serves her a homemade meal...

'...Aahhhhhhhhhnn!' 'I can't take it anymore!'

With a face full of bliss, Yuzuki devours the meal completely! Seeing her eat so happily, Suzufumi decides to tempt her with her favorite dishes and make her succumb to 'food bliss.'

Thus begins a food-filled romcom, where a slightly special neighbor captures both her stomach and heart!
description.ja:
"おせっかい”な高校生・真守鈴文はお腹を空かせて倒れていたマンションの隣人を助ける。
その正体は人気絶頂の女子高生アイドル・有須優月だった!

理想のアイドルでいるため、過度な食事制限をしていた優月。
だが心配した鈴文が手料理をふるまうと、

「……はああああああああああああっっ!」
「もう、無理ぃっ……!」

と幸せいっぱいの顔で完食! その食べっぷりに鈴文は、優月の大好物で誘惑して《メシ堕ち》させることを決意する。
ちょっと特別なお隣さんのお腹とハートを掴む、メシ堕ちラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true...

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

Wie weit würdest du gehen, um die Person zu stürzen, die du am meisten hasst? Ohne Haus, ohne Job und mit nichts mehr zu verlieren, ist Geunyeong Lee bereit, alles zu riskieren, um den K-Pop-Superstar Whojoon zu Fall zu bringen. Aber nachdem die beiden sich erst einmal richtig kennengelernt haben, erweist sich ihr Vorhaben plötzlich als schwieriger als gedacht. description.ko:
누구나 한 번쯤 상상하는 일이 이루어졌다. 
세계적인 K-POP 톱스타와의 24시간 밀착 동거. 
그러나…… 나는 그의 안티팬이다!.. 

--

잡지사 [원더우먼] 피처팀 3년차 기자, 이근영.  
진정한 '원더우먼'을 꿈꾸며 입사했지만 현실은 온갖 잡다구리한 일만 하는, 일명 ‘포스트잇 기자’다. 


첫 단독 취재를 노리고 근영이 향한 곳은 클럽 ‘베니’ 오픈식. 
그곳에 K-POP 역사를 새롭게 쓰고 있는 데뷔 6년 차 톱스타, 후준이 온다는 소식에  
근영은 특종을 노리고 후준만을 기다리다 뜻밖의 장면을 목격한다.  
바로 여자 화장실 앞에서 느닷없이 나타난 후준이 어떤 여자에게 따귀를 날리는 게 아닌가! 
그 뜻밖의 시추에이션에 하필 근영이 들고 있던 건 사진기자 수환이 맡긴 카메라.   
그런데, 그게 화근이었다. 간당간당했던 기자 생활에 종말을 맞이하게 된 것은. 

막무가내 취재로 오해한 후준은 근영이 안고 있던 카메라를 빼앗아 던지고,  
흥분한 근영은 후준에게 따지려다 그의 발에 오바이트를 한다.  


클럽 오픈식에서 걸쭉한(?) 사고를 낸 다음날, 근영은 갑자기 잡지사에서 잘린다.  
그리고 그 배후에 후준이 있다는 것을 알게 된 근영은 후준과의 전면전을 선포한다. 
이제 근영에게 남은 건 흉하게 공개된 얼굴과 ‘후준의 미친 안티팬’이란 낙인뿐.  


갑작스런 실직도 모자라 늘어나는 카드빚으로 월세 집에서도 쫓겨나게 생긴 근영.  
그런 그녀에게 갑자기 내려온 동아줄! 바로 리얼리티 예능 프로그램의 출연이다. 
그런데… 상대가 누구라고? 거기서 왜 또 후준이 나와?! 
이 인간, 가까이서 보니 모니터 속 모습과 사생활이 완전 식스센스 반전급이다.  
그래, 이 인간의 이중생활을 이제 정말 낱낱이 파헤쳐주겠다!

---

Um romance entre o famoso astro do K-pop Hoo Joon e sua repórter oficial anti-fãs Lee Geun-Young, que acabam coabitando...!

Até onde você iria para derrubar a pessoa que você mais odeia? Sem casa, sem emprego e sem nada a perder, Geunyeong Lee está disposta a arriscar tudo para derrubar o tesouro nacional do país, o superastro coreano Hoo Joon. Mas quando os dois realmente se conhecem, derrubá-lo de repente se torna muito mais difícil. Será que ela conseguirá acabar com ele de uma vez por todas depois de descobrir a verdade sobre o homem por trás do popstar?

altTitles.ja: SCPをざっくり紹介

description.en:
The SCP Foundation is a fictional organization documented by the web-based collaborative fiction project of the same name. In universe, the SCP Foundation is responsible for locating and containing individuals, entities, locations, and objects that violate natural law (referred to as SCPs).  
  
This manga summarizes the reports of the SCPs currently under the Foundation.  
  
Based on the [SCP Foundation](http://www.scp-wiki.net/)

altTitles.ja: 家がない！

description.en:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

altTitles.es-la: Diario De Supervivencia De La Niña Escoria

description.en:
Everyone gets reincarnated as the heroine when they're dropped into another world, right?! So why am I a supporting character?! Worse still, I'm inside my own novel, one with a bad ending!

---

**Contents:** 1 (prologue) + 116 + 26 (ending A) + 11 (ending B) = 154 Chapters
- **Vol. 1:** Main story (ch. 0-116)
- **Vol. 2:** Ending A (ch. 117A-142A)
- **Vol. 3:** Ending B (ch. 117B-127B)

**Note:** You can read ending B without reading ending A.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch

altTitles.zh: 关于被班上绿茶威胁那件事

altTitles.zh-ro: Guānyú bèi bān shàng lǜchá wēixié nà jiàn shì

altTitles.zh-hk: 關於被班上綠茶威脅那件事

altTitles.fr: La fois où la garce manipulatrice [garce au thé vert] de ma classe m'a fait chanter

description.en:
Green Tea Bitch (n.): A woman who pretends to be pure and innocent but is actually manipulative and calculating.

When school ends, a good honor student is threatened by the class's green tea bitch.
"I never thought a wide-eyed goody-two-shoes like you would do something like this."
"If you don't want me to tell everyone your shameful secret…"

A cute romance that stems from a misunderstanding begins in *That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch*!

altTitles.ja: 残酷な神が支配する

altTitles.en: A Cruel God Reigns in Heaven
Psycho Suspense: A Cruel God Reigns

altTitles.ja-ro: Zankoku na Kami ga Shihai Suru

description.en:
A Savage God Reigns portrays the tale of two step-brothers – Jeremy and Ian – as they strive to discover their separate paths towards redemption.  
 
---
- **Won the 1st Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 1997**
description.ja: 友達に恵まれ、ボランティアと勉強に励む幸せな生活を送っていたジェルミの日常は、ある男との出会いで一変する。母・サンドラの婚約者で大金持ちの英国紳士・グレッグ。ジェルミの苦痛に満ちた地獄の日々が始まった

title.en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica - Mami Tomoe's Everyday Life

altTitles.ja: 巴マミの平凡な日常

description.ja: Mami Tomoe's Everyday Life is a slice-of-life featuring a lonely, single, 30-year old Mami Tomoe. It is a remake of the author's original doujinshi series, Mami Tomoe 1X Years Later Mami-san Around 30 Years Old Collection.

altTitles.fr: Le dragon domestique de Mme. Kobayashi

altTitles.es: La sirvienta dragón de la señorita Kobayashi

altTitles.th: น้องเมดมังกรของคุณโคบายาชิ

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Dragão da Senhorita Kobayashi

altTitles.pt: A Empregada Dragão da Senhora Kobayashi

description.en:
Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.  
A mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%9E%97%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AE%E3%83%A1%E3%82%A4%E3%83%89%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B4%E3%83%B3)
description.ru:
Жила себе и жила Кобаяши-сан. Одна в своей квартире, пока на пороге её дома не появилась Тору, у которой долг перед Кобаяши-сан за своё спасение. И Тору всячески желает вернуть его различными способами каждый день. Милая и повседневная комедия. Только есть одна необычная деталь: Тору – влюбленная драконесса.  
  
Licensed in English by Seven Seas as "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid."  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18807)
description.es-la: Kobayashi vive en un apartamento cuando un dia un dragon llamado Tooru toca a su puerta. Tooru piensa que los humanos son humildes y tontos pero ella tiene una deuda con Kobayashi que la salvo en el pasado. Por eso todos los dias Tooru trata de usar sus poderes para ayudar a Kobayashi en varias cosas. Una comedia de una señora de oficina y una linda chica maid dragon viviendo juntas el día a día
description.pt-br: Kobayashi vive sozinha em um apartamento, até que um dia, Tooru, a garota dragão, apareceu e elas acabaram morando juntas. Tooru vê os humanos como seres inferiores e tolos. Mas tendo sido salva por Kobayashi-san, ela faz tudo que pode para pagar a dívida e ajudá-la com várias coisas, embora nem tudo corre conforme o planejado. Uma comédia do cotidiano mítico sobre uma mulher do escritório trabalhando duro para viver com uma garota dragão.

altTitles.ja: 四つ子ぐらし

description.en:
My name is Miyabi Mifu. I'm a lonely sixth-grader, and I don't have any parents or relatives.....or so I thought for the last twelve years!

One day, I found out I'm a quadruplet!! Three other girls that have the same face and voice: Ichika-chan, Nitori-chan, and Shizuki-chan. We were all raised alone in different places, but from now on we're going to be living under the same roof. However, living with only other children is chaos! Also, the differences in our upbringing could lead to some uexpected circumstances...?

We're all the same, but we're also different! Our cute sisterhood life begins now!

When Seyeon Han finds out that her boyfriend of three years has been cheating on her, she is absolutely devastated. Not wanting to stick around to deal with the heartbreak, she decides to book a flight to Rio de Janeiro and plans to forget all about her ex! During her vacation, she meets the gorgeous and alluring, Jihyuk Joo, and the two decide to have a one-night stand. Seyeon thought she would never see Jihyuk again, so imagine her surprise when she shows up to work and realizes that her one-night stand is now… her new boss.
description.ko:
“저 곧 결혼합니다.”
“네? 갑자기 누구랑요?”
“한세연 씨와 말입니다.”

결혼을 앞둔 남자친구 준휘의 바람을 알고 홧김에 여행을 떠난 세연
화려한 브라질의 리우 카니발, 그곳에서 그 남자, 지혁을 만났다.
홀린 듯 보낸 하룻밤 뒤에 세연의 직장 상사로 나타난 지혁.
그리고 새로운 축복이 찾아오고 있었는데!
‘선 임신, 후 연애’하는 아찔한 커플의 결혼 전쟁기.

인생 장르는 로맨스 코미디, 당차고 힘쎈 체육선생님 한세연.
평소에는 무뚝뚝하나 침대 위에선 폭군, 순정계략남 이사장님 주지혁.
양진고등학교에서 펼쳐지는 이사장님과 체육선생님의 로맨스.

altTitles.ja: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

altTitles.en: Here He Comes, My President Daddy

altTitles.es-la: Aquí Viene mi Papá el Presidente

altTitles.ja: 社長パパが追っかけてくる

description.en: Shocking! On the big screen, the pictures of an intimate couple…depict none other than her fiancé and little sister! Facing the double betrayal of her relatives and lover, the innocent Ruo Yun Fei was framed as the main offender of that scandal, with all fingers pointed at her. Three years later, as she came back with her beautiful three-year-old daughter, a handsome and charming prince of W city appeared out of nowhere, claiming he is the child’s father?

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: Did You Reject Mr. Lu Today?

altTitles.zh-ro: Jintian Jujue Lu Xiansheng Le Ma?

altTitles.en: Do I Refuse Mr. Lu Today?
Another Day of Rejecting Mr. Lu

description.en: Gu Yi Xue is a headstrong and beautiful woman, but her family's company is facing bankruptcy. Lu Li Yang, a bossy company president, offers marriage to save Yi Xue's family, but she refuses. But even when Yi Xue doesn't want to marry Li Yang, he'd do anything to make her his wife

altTitles.ja: 妖怪バスター村上

description.en: Terrifying yokai from hundreds of years ago have been released into the present day. Kuin the exorcist stands tall to protect the peace of this world! But in this war of Yokai vs. Exorcist, regular high schooler Murakami has entered the battle! Comedic genius Daiki Ihara's new series is a yokai battle comedy for the modern world! Tagline: The future is now, Yokai!

title.en: Ms. Fox, What Are You Doing?

description.en:
"Like my older sisters, I'm going to seduce men and wrap them around my fingers!"

Once upon a time, the nine-tailed fox sisters spent happy days consuming the spirits/energy of men passing through the mountain road. However, the youngest among them, Arangi, suddenly said that he would seduce a man and that she would go to the human world...

altTitles.ja: 戦車椅子: TANK CHAIR

description.en:
Protecting his sister Shizuka from a bullet, the strongest assassin Nagi Taira falls into a coma. Against all odds, he regains his consciousness- but only when faced with killing intent! Thus begins a violent journey of recovery, battling the most dangerous foes.

---
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10517/episode/349974) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 妹を銃弾から守ったことで意識戻らぬ身となってしまった最強の殺し屋・平良凪（タイラナギ）。しかし彼は“殺意”を向けられると、わずかな時間だけ意識が戻る特殊体質の持ち主だった！完全覚醒を果たすため、今日も凪は改造車椅子で強敵達との“リハビリ”を始める――！鬼才・やしろ学が描く最凶のダークヒーローによるバイオレンス・アクション――ッ!!
description.pt-br: Ao proteger sua irmã Shizuka de um tiro, o assassino mais forte, Nagi Taira, entra em coma. Indo contra todas as probabilidades, ele recupera sua consciência — mas apenas quando enfrenta intenções assassinas! Assim eles começam uma violenta jornada de recuperação e lutas contra os inimigos mais perigosos.

title.en: Ryuu to Yuusha to Haitatsunin Shikaban

altTitles.ja: 竜と勇者と配達人 私家版

altTitles.en: The Dragon, the Hero, and the Courier: Self-Published Edition

description.en:
Bonus chapters that never made it into volumes, infodumps, behind-the-scene stories, new bonus chapters, and much more from "The Dragon, the Hero, and the Courier", a rather strange medieval fantasy manga.
This book was self-published by the author with permission from Shueisha.

title.en: Contractual Marriage to a Surly Duke

altTitles.en: Contractual Marriage to a Sickly? Husband
Contractual Marriage to a Surly Duke

altTitles.es: Esposa por contrato de un marido enfermizo

altTitles.zh: 体弱多病？丈夫的合约妻子

altTitles.es-la: ¿Mi Esposo Esta Enfermo? Soy Su Esposa Por Contrato.

description.en:
Reincarnation became a villain who poisoned her husband in a novel, but she was actually just a down-and-out young lady who was forced to contract marriage... If she didn't give birth to an heir, she would be driven away by her mother-in-law, and her husband who was sick and weak also kept her away from her. "We can pretend to be husband and wife, but we can't have children." Who is poisoning his husband? Selene is determined to investigate and help her husband recover. And in the process, her husband's attitude gradually changed?

---
[Official S. Chinese](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9840/)

altTitles.ja: 魔王の娘、すごくチョロい。

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Daughter Is Way Too Easy

altTitles.vi: Con gái của quỷ vương dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
description.ja:
かつて魔王と勇者は対決し、魔王は封印され勇者は力尽きた…。魔王の娘であるヘルは父の仇である勇者への恨みを晴らすべく、彼を蘇らせ、そして下僕としてこき使ってやろうと考えていた。だが、蘇ってきた勇者は何だかやたらとキラキラしていてカッコ良くて、ヘルの調子は狂いっぱなし。

果たして勇者を下僕として苦しめることは出来るのか…!?

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Sensação de Diversão com seus brinquedos

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

title.en: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo, Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu

altTitles.ja: 生まれた直後に捨てられたけど、前世が大賢者だったので余裕で生きてます

altTitles.en: Since My Previous Life was a Wise Man, I can Afford to Live.

description.en:
Born to excellent parents, Reus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking!

Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!
description.ja:
見た目は赤ちゃん、だけど中身は大賢者!?

世界を変えた最強の魔法使い・大賢者アリストテレウスがその生涯を閉じた…。
だが大賢者アリストテレウスは、死んだ後に転生の魔道具を使い、転生することに成功したのだった。
転生した先は、何百、何千年経ったのかも分からない後の世界の魔法名門家の赤子。
恵まれた人生を歩むはずが、内に宿した規格外の魔力のせいか勘違いされ、生まれた直後に捨てられてしまう…!?
しかし大賢者の能力と記憶を持つ赤子は、聖竜杖リントヴルムをお供に余裕で生き抜くのだった…!!

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

altTitles.vi: Cô em gái rất yêu anh mình

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
